name: FIRST_REMOTE_AUDIO_DECODED
description:
Occurs when the SDK decodes the first remote audio frame for playback.Deprecated:
  Deprecated as of v3.0.0. Please use REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_CHANGED instead.
       
   
   The SDK triggers this callback under one of the following circumstances:
                    The remote user joins the channel and sends the audio stream.
                    The remote user stops sending the audio stream and re-sends it after 15 seconds. The remote user stops sending the audio stream and re-sends it after 15 seconds. Reasons for such an interruption include:
                            The remote user leaves channel.
                            The remote user drops offline.
                            The remote user calls muteLocalAudioStream to stop sending the audio stream.
                            The remote user calls disableAudio to disable audio.

parameters.uid: The user ID of the remote user.

parameters.elapsed: Time elapsed (ms) from the local user calling joinChannel until the SDK triggers this callback.
